thread.title: 12 injured when car plows into crowd at New Orleans parade
thread.title_full: 12 injured when car plows into crowd at New Orleans parade

title: 12 injured when car plows into crowd at New Orleans parade
text:
Car plows into crowd at Mardi Gras parade in New Orleans, a dozen people in critical condition 12 injured when car plows into crowd at New Orleans parade THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Authorities are at the scene where a vehicle plowed into a crowd near a Mardi Gras parade at Orleans and Carrollton Aves. Saturday night in New Orleans. (Neil Giurintano/WWL-TV) THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   
NEW ORLEANS — Police say 12 people were injured when a vehicle plowed into a crowd watching the Krewe of Endymion parade in the Mid-City section of New Orleans. 
The Times-Picayune reports the crash was reported Saturday at about 6:45 p.m. 
New Orleans Police Department spokeswoman Ambria Washington says that “initial reports show so far that about a dozen people are in critical condition.” 
She says that number could increase as the investigation continues.
